exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros net e H. unfold lifted_directly_committed in H. unfold directly_committed. destruct H as [quorum [Hnodup [Hlen Hall]]]. exists quorum. split. -- apply Hnodup. split. -- apply Hlen. -- intros h Hin. pose proof (all_the_way_deghost_spec net h) as Hstate. rewrite <- Hstate. apply Hall. auto.
